name: 指揮法（二）
description:
1.使學生具有基本指揮技巧能力
    2.使學生具有指揮合唱基本知識
    3.使學生了解基本樂團指揮知識
goals: 使學生具有基本指揮技巧能力
使學生具有指揮合唱基本知識
使學生了解基本樂團指揮知識
syllabus:
\* 出席率：出席率非常重要，以利技巧上實地操作演練， 增長指揮**技巧上之**後續精進  

\* 教科書：

1\. The Modern Conductor by Elizabeth A. H. Green & M. Gibson. Prentice-Hall, Inc.

2\. Preparatory Exercises in Score Reading by R. O. Morris & Howard Ferguson

教學目標：

In class, students gain a broader appreciation, and deeper understanding of the literature by music making. Practicing the method of rehearsing, conducting basic techniques and teaching an ensemble, working though careful listening, executing details, examining details, team work and performing through choral and standard master symphonic repertoire excerpts.

幫助學生深入了解指揮之技巧、音樂表現、對樂曲明確認識及掌握演出時所需具備的條件與風格。
